title: Take Profit Trader Check website
description: Take Profit Trader, based in the United States, was established in March 2021. The firm operates in futures markets and offers a 1 Step program. Supported platforms include Tradovate, TradingView, Quantower, NinjaTrader, and more. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Counter Positions: Cannot hold open positions in opposite directions on same/related products.
CME Price Limit: Responsibility to exit before hitting limits.
High Frequency Trading / Micro Scalping prohibited.

payout_policy.minimum_payout: Not specified, but implies a 'buffer zone' (max drawdown level) must be reached.
payout_policy.processing_time: Same day (Tech updates for AML mentioned).
payout_policy.details: 80% split (Pro), 90% split (Pro+). Payouts available day one if buffer reached ($10K profit in single day or consistent withdrawals for Pro+).

firm_rules.inactivity_rule: Must trade at least one day per calendar week (Sunday-Friday).
firm_rules.news_trading: Test: Allowed. Pro/Pro+: Restricted 1 min before/after specific events (FOMC, NFP, CPI, Inventories).
forbidden_strategies: Counter Positions: Cannot hold open positions in opposite directions on same/related products.
CME Price Limit: Responsibility to exit before hitting limits.
High Frequency Trading / Micro Scalping prohibited.

seo_content:
Take Profit Trader Technical Infrastructure

Take Profit Trader, based in the United States, was established in March 2021. The firm operates in futures markets and offers a 1 Step program. Supported platforms include Tradovate, TradingView, Quantower, NinjaTrader, and more. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.description: Complete technical breakdown of Take Profit Trader. We analyze their forex environment and execution rules.
